member.summary: Provides various animation utilities.

member.summary: Ticks per frame at 60 frames per second.

member.returns: Info on what type of skinning the elements contain.

member.name: M:Xclna.Xna.Animation.Util.ReflectMatrix(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Matrix@)
member.summary: Reflects a matrix across the Z axis by multiplying both the Z column and the Z row by -1 such that the Z,Z element stays intact.
member.param: The matrix to be reflected across the Z axis

member.name: M:Xclna.Xna.Animation.Util.Convert``1(System.Byte[],System.Int32,Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.GraphicsDevice)
member.summary: Converts from an array of bytes to any vertex type.
member.typeparam: The type of vertex to which we are converting the bytes
member.param: The bytes that will be converted to the vertices
The size of one vertex
Any working device; required to use our conversion hack
member.returns: An array of the converted vertices

member.summary: Roughly decomposes two matrices and performs spherical linear interpolation
member.param: Source matrix for interpolation
Destination matrix for interpolation
Ratio of interpolation
member.returns: The interpolated matrix

member.summary: Roughly decomposes two matrices and performs spherical linear interpolation
member.param: Source matrix for interpolation
Destination matrix for interpolation
Ratio of interpolation
Stores the result of hte interpolation.

member.name: T:Xclna.Xna.Animation.AnimationEventHandler
member.summary: Used for events dealing with an animation controller.
member.param: The AnimationController that raised this event.
The EventArgs.

member.name: T:Xclna.Xna.Animation.IAnimationController
member.summary: An interface used by BonePose that allows an animation to affect the bone as a function of time.

member.name: M:Xclna.Xna.Animation.IAnimationController.GetCurrentBoneTransform(Xclna.Xna.Animation.BonePose,Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Matrix@)
member.summary: Gets the current transform for the given BonePose object in the animation. This is only called when a bone pose is affected by the current animation.
member.param: The BonePose object querying for the current transform in the animation.
The transform of the BonePose object to be set.

member.name: M:Xclna.Xna.Animation.IAnimationController.ContainsAnimationTrack(Xclna.Xna.Animation.BonePose)
member.summary: Gets a value determining whether the animation can potentially affect the given BonePose.
member.param: The BonePose to test.
member.returns: True if the animation can affect the bone and contains a track for it.

member.name: E:Xclna.Xna.Animation.IAnimationController.AnimationEnded
member.summary: Event fired when an animation ends.

member.name: P:Xclna.Xna.Animation.IAnimationController.IsLooping
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not the animation is looping.

member.name: P:Xclna.Xna.Animation.IAnimationController.Duration
member.summary: Gets the duration of the animation in ticks.

member.name: P:Xclna.Xna.Animation.IAnimationController.ElapsedTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the elapsed time in ticks for the animation.

member.name: P:Xclna.Xna.Animation.IAnimationController.SpeedFactor
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that is multiplied by the elapsed game time.

member.name: T:Xclna.Xna.Animation.AnimationController
member.summary: Controls an animation by advancing it's time and affecting bone transforms

member.name: M:Xclna.Xna.Animation.AnimationController.#ctor(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Game,Xclna.Xna.Animation.AnimationInfo)
member.summary: Creates a new animation controller.
member.param: The game to which this controller will be attached.
The source animation that the controller will use. This is stored in the ModelAnimator class.

member.name: M:Xclna.Xna.Animation.AnimationController.OnAnimationEnded(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Called when the current animation reaches the end.
member.param: The event args.

member.name: M:Xclna.Xna.Animation.AnimationController.Update(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.GameTime)
member.summary: Advances the current time in the animation.
member.param: Contains the time by which the animation will be advanced

member.name: M:Xclna.Xna.Animation.AnimationController.GetCurrentBoneTransform(Xclna.Xna.Animation.BonePose,Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Matrix@)
member.summary: Gets the current transform for the given BonePose object in the animation. This is only called when a bone pose is affected by the current animation.
member.param: The BonePose object querying for the current transform in the animation.
The transform of the BonePose object to be set.

member.summary: Returns true if the animation contains a track for the given BonePose.
member.param: The BonePose to test for track existence.
member.returns: True if the animation contains a track for the given BonePose.

member.name: E:Xclna.Xna.Animation.AnimationController.AnimationEnded
member.summary: Fired when the controller is not looping and the animation has ended.

member.name: P:Xclna.Xna.Animation.AnimationController.IsLooping
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines if the animation is looping.

member.name: P:Xclna.Xna.Animation.AnimationController.Duration
member.summary: Gets the total duration, in ticks, of the animation.

member.name: P:Xclna.Xna.Animation.AnimationController.AnimationSource
member.summary: Gets the source animation that this controller is using.

member.name: P:Xclna.Xna.Animation.AnimationController.ElapsedTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the elapsed time for the animation.

member.name: P:Xclna.Xna.Animation.AnimationController.SpeedFactor
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that is multiplied by the time when it is advanced to determine the playback speed of the animation.

member.summary: Gets the name of the bone.

member.name: P:Xclna.Xna.Animation.BonePose.CurrentController
member.summary: Gets or sets the current animation that affects this bone. If null, then DefaultTransform will be used for this bone's transform.

member.name: P:Xclna.Xna.Animation.BonePose.CurrentBlendController
member.summary: Gets or sets the blend animation that affects this bone. If the value is null, then no blending will occur.

member.name: P:Xclna.Xna.Animation.BonePose.BlendFactor
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount to interpolate between the current animation and the current blend animation, if the current blend animation is not null

member.name: P:Xclna.Xna.Animation.BonePose.DefaultTransform
member.summary: Represents the matrix used by the BonePose when it is not affected by an animation or when the animation does not contain a track for the bone.
